recipe.title: Oregano-Marinated Tomato Salad
ingredients: 3 lb. mixed heirloom tomatoes (preferably various colors and sizes), cut into wedges or halved if small
instructions: Toss tomatoes, oil, oregano, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl. Let sit, tossing occasionally, until juicy and deeply flavored, at least 30 minutes and up to 1 hour.
